archimate:Requirement.name: IA-2(8): Identification and Authentication (organizational Users) | Access to Accounts â€” Replay Resistant
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Implement replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for access to [Selection (one or more): privileged accounts; non-privileged accounts].

properties.value: Authentication processes resist replay attacks if it is impractical to achieve successful authentications by replaying previous authentication messages. Replay-resistant techniques include protocols that use nonces or challenges such as time synchronous or cryptographic authenticators.
